title: Drawing, "Leigh B. Block Apartment: Terrace Game Room", 1934-1935
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower left: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
description: Floor plan of terrace game room for Leigh B. Block Apartment. Double-door entrance to room at center of north wall. Wrap-around sofa on south west corner, end table at left, coffee table in front of sofa. Two club chairs near north wall facing sofa. Semi-circular bar on south wall; five circular bar stools on outside of bar. Shelves lining wall behind bar, entrance inside bar area at right. Love seat flanked by two end tables on south wall towards far right. Square card table with four chairs in upper right corner of room. Linoleum pattern throughout room is geometric with small circles; lines outlining shape of bar and other parts of room.
